welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Eustache, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
